abstract: The home improvement chain said it had fired the people who sent a Twitter message that was criticized as being racially insensitive.
snippet: The home improvement chain said it had fired the people who sent a Twitter message that was criticized as being racially insensitive.
lead_paragraph: Home Depot spent much of Thursday and Friday scrambling to apologize after a message sent from the company’s primary Twitter account, @HomeDepot, was criticized as racially insensitive.

headline.main: Home Depot Apologizes for a Tweet That Offends
headline.print_headline: Home Depot Apologizes For a Tweet That Offends
